REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2300 reute h f BC-<HOOKER-CORP-LTD>-NAM 04-07 0043

TEXT.TITLE: <HOOKER CORP LTD> NAMES NEW PRESIDENT FOR UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Hooker Corp Ltd of Australia said it has named A. Anthony McLellen to the new position of president of Hooker Holdings (U.S.A.) Inc, the holding company for Hooker Corp's U.S. operations. Reuter
